subtitle.label: intro
subtitle.value: A Fullstack Developer specialized in Web and Mobile Development, Javascript, API, Responsive Web Design and UI/UX

overview.label: overview
overview.value: System for pawn evaluators to work with gemology, watchmaking, and high-value pens. Developed with Typescript, Next.js, Postgres, JWT, and React Query. Responsive design for desktop and mobile.

description.label: description
description.value: Project of a system for pawn evaluators, currently encompassing three sectors of pawn: gemology, watchmaking, and high-value pens. The gemology section includes tools for calculating the qualities and characteristics of gems. The watchmaking and pens sections allow users to update databases with details and images of each item.

details.label: details
details.value: The system, developed with Typescript using Next.js and supported by Postgres database managed with Prisma, integrates JWT authentication for access control, TanStack Query (React Query) to manage cache and request of data and TanStack Table (React Table) to easy and fast implementation of the tables for the user. Additionally, it maintains a content change log for audit purposes. And it is fully operational and responsive, ensuring seamless operation on the small screens of mobile devices.

overview.label: overview
overview.value: App project designed for music artists, service and equipment providers and potential hirers. It covers UI/UX, frontend, database, and backend. Developed using Typescript, React Native, Postgres and JWT. Compatible with Android and iOS platforms.

description.label: description
description.value: An app created to facilitate communication between music artists and potential hirers, providing a platform for artists to showcase their talents and for event producers to articulate their needs for finding suitable performers. Additionally, it serves as a platform for service and equipment providers to showcase their offerings.

details.label: details
details.value: The project covers UI/UX research, designing, prototyping, frontend and backend development and database architecture. Developed using Typescript within React Native, with Postgres as a primary database solution. The authentication system relies on JWT (JSON Web Tokens). The application is optimized for speed, lightweight functionality, and is operational on both Android and iOS platforms, ensuring a flawless user experience.

overview.label: overview
overview.value: Personal project of a finance app designed for ease and efficiency, covering UI/UX, frontend, database, and backend. Developed using Typescript, React Native, Postgres and JWT, it operates on both Android and iOS platforms.

description.label: description
description.value: This personal project aimed to replace traditional paper-based financial notes with an easy and optimized solution. The objective was to create a simple, straightforward, and user-friendly tool to facilitating efficient financial organization.

details.label: details
details.value: The complete project encompassed UI/UX research, design, prototyping, frontend and backend development, and database architecture. Developed using Typescript in React Native, with Postgres serving as the primary database solution and employing JWT authentication. The application is optimized for speed, lightweight functionality, and seamless operation on both Android and iOS platforms, ensuring and optimal user experience.

description.label: description
description.value: Planning and creation of digital products and services, focusing on user experience and interface design.

work.label: work
work.value: I developed three complete projects, starting with research, user interviews, competitor analysis, proto-personas, user journey mapping, CSD matrix, UX metrics, maps and flows, wireframes, usability testing, to branding and high-fidelity prototypes, among other elements.

tools.label: tools
tools.value: I adopted the Spiral UX UI Continuous methodology, an abstraction of the Double Diamond method, to conduct my projects, using Figma as the main tool.

achievements.label: achievements
achievements.value: I received positive feedback on all projects for the simplified approach, attention to detail, and appreciation for the results and information provided.

description.label: description
description.value: Development of responsive web projects and native mobile applications.

work.label: work
work.value: While developing two responsive web platforms using Next.js and two native mobile applications for Android and iOS with React Native CLI, I managed both the frontend and backend, including the implementation of API, secure authentication, and database.

tools.label: tools
tools.value: Initially, I gained proficiency in languages like C, JavaScript, and Swift, and configured VPS servers using Nginx, Apache, Postgres, MariaDB, NodeJS, Docker, Git and PM2 for project hosting. I developed smaller projects using C, PHP, ViteJS, Express, MongoDB, Strapi, Bootstrap, Swift, and pure JavaScript. Currently, I focus on tools such as Git, VSCode, Node, Typescript, NextJS, ViteJS, TailwindCSS, Docker, Jest, and JWT (JSON Web Token), using them as primary resources in project development.

achievements.label: achievements
achievements.value: My projects include tools implemented in a port movements control room, contributing to daily operations. Developing and maintaining operational a pawn evaluation platform, and a financial control solution. While developing complex tables with selection, filtering, and sorting features, I opted to use the TanStack React Table and React Query libraries for cache management, resulting in significant performance improvements. Additionally, to address slow select inputs due to the large list of items, I implemented React Window to optimize rendering, significantly improving form performance and user experience. All products were delivered before the deadline, allowing for enhancements. Furthermore, I selected the Postgres database for its scalability potential. Also, I just finished developing an application for hiring services in local music market. Despite being my first professional projects, they received praise for attention to details, performance, and professionalism delivered.
